title: I and My Husband Sleep in a Coffin - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Horror   Martial Arts   Mature   Romance   Supernatural   Yaoi
tags: Amnesia   Cohabitation   Cute Protagonist   Dead Protagonist   Death   Doting Love Interests   Fanaticism   Handsome Male Lead   Immortals   Jiangshi   Lazy Protagonist   Long Separations   Lovers Reunited   Male Yandere   Marriage   Mysterious Past   Obsessive Love   Past Trauma   Playful Protagonist   Possessive Characters   Reincarnation   Revenge   Special Abilities   Tragic Past   Transmigration   Zombies
author: Wu Shui Bu Du   无水不渡
description:
My name is Wang Xiao Mie. I’m online asking for help.

If you wake up and find yourself sleeping in a coffin inside a tomb and wearing a red wedding gown,and lying next to you is a real devil husband. What should I do if he wants to have a wedding night? Can I faint? After fainting will I be able to transmigrate back?

Waiting online. It’s very urgent.>
